[[notes/Benefits of note-taking|Benefits of note-taking]]

/notes/Benefits-of-note-taking.title: Benefits of note-taking
/notes/Benefits-of-note-taking.content: As you start learning programming, you'll quickly realize that there's a lot of information to absorb. From syntax rules to programming concepts and best practices, there's a lot to keep track of. That's where note-taking comes in. By taking notes, you can improve your retention of information, stay organized, and enhance your understanding of programming concepts.
